programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: Judgment Of The Firefighter Killer With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Harry Beck thought he was doing the right thing when he agreed to talk to his brother Dave's on-again off-again girlfriend Kimberly Passwaters about their relationship. But when Dave killed her, the right thing became being the state's star witness.

programme.title: Victim to Verdict: Movie Popcorn Murder
programme.sub-title: Victim to Verdict: Movie Popcorn Murder
programme.desc: A Sunday afternoon movie date turns deadly when a confrontation over a cell phone and a bag of popcorn ends with a gunshot and retired police captain Curtis Reeves claims he acted in self-defense.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a man inside his suburban Los Angeles home sets off a chain reaction of murder, conspiracy, and furious cover ups, which ultimately point back to a mastermind who's in it for the money.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Law enforcement investigates a series of unsolved murders in the state of Colorado over the course of a year, only to realize all the seemingly isolated incidents all point back to a single FBI informant.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Cops investigate the apparent carjacking of a husband and wife in East Los Angeles, California only to discover that the ambush was a ruse, carried out by cousins, to kill the husband for insurance money.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A triple homicide in small town Maine rocks a community and destroys a family. It doesn't take police long to piece together the elements of the crime, and its ruthless cover-up, which point back to a perpetrator close to home.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A disgruntled man snaps and goes on a killing spree, terrorizing the entire borough of Brooklyn, New York. Cops track the killer's trail of victims for more than 24 hours before they finally hunt him down across the city.
